properties.Site_Address_Intersection: W. FOOTHILL BLVD / N. LARCH AVE
properties.Identified_in_Last_Two_Planning: Used in Two Consecutive Prior Housing Elements - Vacant
properties.Zoning_Designation_Current_Desc: The Vision for the Foothill Boulevard Specific Plan is to identify the City of Rialto as a unique, vibrant community. The Specific Plan will be a tool to create positive change in this area of Rialto through implementation of Development Standards that will result in quality new development which will in turn encourage revitalization of existing development. The Specific Plan identifies public investment in infrastructure to provide opportunity for new and revitalized developments.
